All Implemented Interfaces:

public class PublicationSystemGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Project #2 CS 2334, Section 011 9/19/2013

This class represents a GUI which allows users to use publication systems.

Version:
1.0

Constructor Detail

PublicationSystemGUI

public PublicationSystemGUI(int width,
                            int height)
Creates a GUI designed to allow a user to quickly access and modify a PublicationSystem.

Parameters:
width - The width of the GUI
height - The height of the GUI
Conditions:
PRE - width >= 520 and height >= 680
POST - The GUI is ready to go
